# Bug Report

### Observed Behavior

_A clear and concise description of what happened instead._

## Steps to Reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior:

1. Go to '...'
2. Click on '....'
3. Scroll down to '....'
4. See error

## Context Information

_Add any other context about the problem here._

- Used version [e.g. EDC v1.0.0]
- OS: [e.g. iOS, Windows]
- ...
